text:
Answer concisely (1–2 sentences):
Have Christians or Jews won more Nobel Prizes?

Based on the text material, the author believes that Christians and Jews have won more Nobel Prizes than any other religion. The author cites the fact that Christians have won 114 Nobel Prizes, while Jews have won 109. The author also mentions that Christianity and Judaism are the two largest religions in the world, and that Christians and Jews are both monotheistic religions. The author argues that this suggests that Christians and Jews have won more Nobel Prizes than any other religion.
